headline: Marriott Seen as High-Quality Asset-Light Compounder with Limited Upside: JPMorgan
summary: Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MAR) ranks among the best cyclical stocks to buy now. On June 23, JPMorgan began coverage of Marriott International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MAR) with a Neutral rating and a $284 price target. The bank describes Marriott as a “high-quality, asset-light compounder” with appealing higher-end chain-scale and customer exposure, indicating that it possesses a balanced […]
